briefs.title: AI & Societal Readiness: Who Gets Left Behind?
briefs.insight: Participants distinguished between AI replacing tasks vs. replacing jobs. Consensus: the framing itself is misleading. The real question is institutional readiness.

briefs.title: Is AI Going to Take Our Jobs?
briefs.insight: Healthcare professionals emphasized that AI augmentation in diagnostics requires parallel investment in trust-building with patients and practitioners.
